item.title: Exploring UITFs in the Philippines
item.description: Introduction This post is the second part of a series of posts about Unit Investment Trust Funds or UITFs in the Philippines. In this post, Iâ€™ll dive into the dataset produced in the previous post, looking to answer more specific questions such as: What are the available UITFs in the Philippines? Which banks offer them? What are the different types of UITFs? What are the differences between each type?
